pages.text: Some Oritech machines can directly interact with redstone, such as the portable tank and the portable energy storage. The portable tank's content can be measured using a comparator, and the portable energy storage's output can be disabled with a redstone signal. For all other blocks, a "Redstone Addon Controller" is required.

The redstone addon controller can be attached just like any other addon, and can be configured via the UI. When configured, the data can be read using a comparator. The comparator signal will be output from the addon, not the machine itself. The machine can also be disabled with a redstone signal to the addon.
